participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay optimistic even when faced with challenges.
i teach at a large school.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.

participant_2.background:
I don't talk about my parents.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I'm a hard worker with a sweet tooth.
I don't play for anyone, but I love huge paintings and my favorite food is salad.
i work for a clothes retailer.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I love going to concerts and singing my heart out! What about you?
I love teaching and traveling. I also have a sweet tooth. What about you?
I am also a teacher! I love my job. I love to eat salad, but I have a sweet tooth too.
That's great! I am a hard worker and love my job. I don't talk about my parents, but I love huge paintings.
What kind of paintings do you like? I love landscapes.
I like all kinds of paintings, but my favorite are abstract paintings.
I love seeing what the artist sees in their mind.
Me too! I love the way they can express their thoughts and feelings through their art.
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands. What are you up to this weekend?
I am working! I work for a clothes retailer, and we are always busy on the weekends.
Oh, that's a shame. I hope you get to take a break soon.
Thanks! I am looking forward to my next vacation.
Me too! I am going to take a week off in June to go to Comic Con.
Comic Con is not my thing, but I hope you have a great time!
Thanks! I am sure I will
